page.content: nitrogen to the soil. Oilseed rape is not the only new feature of farming in this area, nor is it the most significant. These are perhaps the amalgamationof farms through purchase into larger units: for example Kincraig was once three farms. The second is the combination of mechanisation and the decline in the workforce.Linked with this is the appearance of farm contractors and co-operation among farmers to purchase and share expensive items of machinery.Mechanisation was not the onlyreason for the decline in the workforce - many left to work in industry:the aluminium smelter or the oil rig construction yards because of the high wages. Farming in this area is modern, efficient and generally prosperous.
